property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.staging-dir
property.description: The staging dir used while submitting jobs.

property.name: mapreduce.framework.name
property.description: The runtime framework for executing MapReduce jobs. Can be one of local, classic or yarn.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.intermediate-user-done-dir.permissions
property.description: The permissions of the user directories in ${mapreduce.jobhistory.intermediate-done-dir}. The user and the group permission must be 7, this is enforced.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.always-scan-user-dir
property.description: Some Cloud FileSystems do not currently update the modification time of directories. To support these filesystems, this configuration value should be set to 'true'.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.cleaner.interval-ms
property.description: How often the job history cleaner checks for files to delete, in milliseconds. Defaults to 86400000 (one day). Files are only deleted if they are older than mapreduce.jobhistory.max-age-ms.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.max-age-ms
property.description: Job history files older than this many milliseconds will be deleted when the history cleaner runs. Defaults to 604800000 (1 week).

property.name: mapreduce.map.cpu.vcores
property.description: The number of virtual cores required for each map task.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.cpu.vcores
property.description: The number of virtual cores required for each reduce task.

property.name: mapreduce.map.java.opts
property.description: Heap-size for child jvms of maps.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.java.opts
property.description: Heap-size for child jvms of reduces.

property.name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.resource.mb
property.description: The amount of memory the MR AppMaster needs.
